verses.verse: I love <S%H157><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> He hears <S%H8085><s%> My voice <S%H6963><s%> [and] my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> He has inclined <S%H5186><s%> His ear <S%H241><s%> to me, Therefore I shall call <S%H7121><s%> [upon Him] as long <S%H3117><s%> as I live. <S%H3117><s%>

The cords <S%H9112><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> encompassed <S%H661><s%> me, And the terrors <S%H4712><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> came <S%H4672><s%> upon me; I found <S%H4672><s%> distress <S%H6869><s%> and sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>
Then I called <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> "O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> Thee, save <S%H4422><s%> my life! <S%H5315><s%>"
Gracious <S%H2587><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and righteous; <S%H6662><s%> Yes, our God <S%H430><s%> is compassionate. <S%H7355><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the simple; <S%H6612><s%> I was brought <S%H1809><s%> low, <S%H1809><s%> and He saved <S%H3467><s%> me.
Return <S%H7725><s%> to your rest, <S%H4494><s%> O my soul, <S%H5315><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has dealt <S%H1580><s%> bountifully <S%H1580><s%> with you.
For Thou hast rescued <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> My eyes <S%H5869><s%> from tears, <S%H1832><s%> My feet <S%H7272><s%> from stumbling. <S%H1762><s%>
I shall walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> In the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
I believed <S%H539><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I said, <S%H1696><s%> "I am greatly <S%H3966><s%> afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>"
I said <S%H559><s%> in my alarm, <S%H2648><s%> "All <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> are liars. <S%H3576><s%>"
What <S%H4100><s%> shall I render <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> His benefits <S%H8408><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> me?
I shall lift <S%H5375><s%> up the cup <S%H3563><s%> of salvation, <S%H3444><s%> And call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
I shall pay <S%H9608><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Oh <S%H4994><s%> [may it be] in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> His people. <S%H5971><s%>
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Is the death <S%H4194><s%> of His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones. <S%H2623><s%>

O <S%H577><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> I am Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> I am Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Thy handmaid, <S%H519><s%> Thou hast loosed <S%H6605><s%> my bonds. <S%H4147><s%>
To Thee I shall offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> And call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
I shall pay <S%H9608><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Oh <S%H4994><s%> [may it be] in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%>
In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the Lord <S%H3050><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, O Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord!
